00022 typedef struct {
00023   int npoints;
00024   double range;
00025 } densparameters;
00026 
00027 
00028 static void ob_densx(densparameters* par,
00029                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00030                      const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00031 {       
00032   int n = par->npoints;
00033   double xmax = par->range;
00034   int i,j,k;
00035   double x,y,z;
00036 
00037   for (k=0; k<n; k++) 
00038     for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00039       for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00040 
00041         x = -xmax+2*xmax*i/(n-1);
00042         y = -xmax+2*xmax*j/(n-1);
00043         z = -xmax+2*xmax*k/(n-1);
00044 
00045         dens[i+j*n+k*n*n] += 
00046           cexp(-0.5*(csqr(x - conj(G1->b[0]))+csqr(y - conj(G1->b[1]))+
00047                      csqr(z - conj(G1->b[2])))/conj(G1->a)
00048                -0.5*(csqr(x - G2->b[0])+csqr(y - G2->b[1])+
00049                      csqr(z - G2->b[2]))/G2->a)*
00050           X->T*X->S;
00051       }
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 static void ob_densp(densparameters* par,
00056                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00057                      const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00058 {       
00059   int n = par->npoints;
00060   double pmax = par->range;
00061   int i,j,k;
00062   double px,py,pz,p2;
00063 
00064   for (k=0; k<n; k++) 
00065     for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00066       for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00067 
00068         px = -pmax+2*pmax*i/(n-1);
00069         py = -pmax+2*pmax*j/(n-1);
00070         pz = -pmax+2*pmax*k/(n-1);
00071         
00072         p2 = px*px+py*py+pz*pz;
00073 
00074         dens[i+j*n+k*n*n] += 
00075           cpow32(conj(G1->a)*G2->a)*
00076           cexp(-0.5*conj(G1->a)*p2 + 
00077                I*(px*conj(G1->b[0])+py*conj(G1->b[1])+pz*conj(G1->b[2]))
00078                -0.5*G2->a*p2 
00079                -I*(px*G2->b[0]+py*G2->b[1]+pz*G2->b[2]))*
00080           X->T*X->S;
00081       }
00082 }

00085 
00086 void calcDensitiesCoordinate3d(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00087                                int n, double x, double* dens)
00088 {
00089   densparameters P = { npoints: n, range: x };
00090   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: n*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densx};
00091 
00092   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_dens, dens);
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 void calcDensitiesMomentum3d(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00097                              int n, double p, double* dens)
00098 {
00099   densparameters P = { npoints: n, range: p };
00100   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: n*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densp};
00101 
00102   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_dens, dens);
00103 }
